remarks: Scalar addition for the closed kernel vector space dual.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lcdsadd.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdsadd.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdsadd.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdsadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` F ) $.
lcdsadd.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdsadd.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
lcdsadd.a $e |- .+b = ( +g ` S ) $.
lcdsadd.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdsadd $p |- ( ph -> .+b = .+ ) $.
